entities.name: honeydukes
entities.description: Honeydukes is mentioned as a place where they have got a new kind of fudge and were giving out free samples. ("Honeydukes has got a new kind of fudge; they were giving out free samples, there’s a bit, look —")

entities.name: three broomsticks
entities.description: The Three Broomsticks is mentioned as a place where ogres are seen. ("We think we saw an ogre, honestly, they get all sorts at the Three Broomsticks —")

entities.name: butterbeer
entities.description: Butterbeer is mentioned as a drink that warms you up. ("Wish we could have brought you some butterbeer, really warms you up —")

entities.name: goblet
entities.description: The goblet is mentioned as something that Lupin drank. ("Lupin drank it?", "He told them all about the goblet.")

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as a person who made Harry a cup of tea and was seen drinking the goblet. ("No, Lupin made me a cup of tea in his oﬀice.", "Lupin drank it?", "He told them all about the goblet.")

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who came into Lupin's office. ("And then Snape came in.")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who reacted to the news about Lupin drinking the goblet. ("Lupin drank it?", "Is he mad?")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who checked her watch and suggested going down to the feast. ("Hermione checked her watch.", "We’d better go down, you know, the feast’ll be starting in five minutes.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who was made tea by Lupin and reacted to the news about Lupin drinking the goblet. ("No, Lupin made me a cup of tea in his oﬀice.", "Lupin drank it?", "Is he mad?")
